content:
We're getting an intermittent QA error related to validating a code against a value set that I think is an IG publisher bug.

The short summary is that when we use some specific codes in a value set, we get a QA error most of the time (but not always).

The details, including steps to reproduce are here: https://github.com/HL7/fhir-ig-publisher/issues/213.

@Grahame Grieve can you please take a look, or is there someone else I can ask? Thanks!
I just checked and this is still happening with v1.1.57 of the IG publisher
Still an issues with v1.1.59. I imagine everyone is going to be busy with the meeting this week, so I'll follow up again afterwards.
